title: Strategy Expands Bitcoin Treasury: $450 Million Purchase Sends Total Holdings To New Highs
summary: Strategy, formerly MicroStrategy, continues to bolster its Bitcoin treasury with a $450 million acquisition. Co-founder Michael Saylor remains bullish on Bitcoi

body.raw:
![Strategy Expands Bitcoin Treasury: $450 Million Purchase Sends Total Holdings To New Highs](https://www.newsbtc.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/09/Screenshot_1254.jpg?fit=750%2C426)

Strategy, formerly MicroStrategy, continues to bolster its Bitcoin treasury with a $450 million acquisition. Co-founder Michael Saylor remains bullish on Bitcoin's potential.

---

**Original Article:** [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/bitcoin-news/strategy-expands-bitcoin-treasury-450-million-purchase-sends-total-holdings-to-new-highs/)

*This article was originally published on [NewsBTC](https://www.newsbtc.com/bitcoin-news/strategy-expands-bitcoin-treasury-450-million-purchase-sends-total-holdings-to-new-highs/) and has been curated for our readers.*
